name: The Sims 2: FreeTime
description:
The Sims 2: FreeTime expansion set includes 10 brand-new hobbies, ranging from film and literature to cooking and dance. When your Sims engage in the hobbies they love, their needs stay filled longer, leading them to happier and more productive Sim lives. Explore your Sim’s inner athlete with a variety of new sports to play outdoors. Spend a few hours at a crafting table to nurture the budding artist. As your Sim explores the world of extracurricular activities, you can unlock more Sims goodies, like lots and aspirations never seen before. FreeTime also includes five more career tracks, expanding your Sims’ lifestyle options.

Group activities make spending time with the entire family more fun than ever. Play more games with your kids than just tickle and toss. Whether they play the social butterfly or spend their spare time in the garage practicing more solitary hobbies, your Sims are bound to enjoy FreeTime… and so are you.
